thread.title: The Palm Houston revives the power lunch
thread.title_full: The Palm Houston revives the power lunch - Houston Chronicle

author: chron.com
title: The Palm Houston revives the power lunch
text:
Photo: The Palm Houston Restaurant Image 1 of / 6 6 The Palm Houston Restaurant , 6100 Westheimer, has started a new three-course ìpower lunchî menu that includes a starter, entrée (with individual side) and dessert for $25.90. Shown: Filet mignon medallions.
Photo: The Palm Houston Restaurant The Palm Houston Restaurant , 6100 Westheimer, has started a new... Image 2 of 6 The Palm Houston Restaurant , 6100 Westheimer, has started a new three-course ìpower lunchî menu that includes a starter, entrée (with individual side) and dessert for $25.90. Shown: Chicken Parmigiana.
Photo: The Palm Houston Restaurant The Palm Houston Restaurant , 6100 Westheimer, has started a new... Image 3 of 6 The Palm Houston Restaurant , 6100 Westheimer, has started a new three-course ìpower lunchî menu that includes a starter, entrée (with individual side) and dessert for $25.90. Shown: Palm desserts including flourless chocolate cake, foreground.
Photo: The Palm Houston Restaurant The Palm Houston Restaurant , 6100 Westheimer, has started a new... Image 4 of 6 Prime New York strip steak and salad at The Palm steakhouse, Houston.
Photo: Palm Restaurant, (C)Renee Comet Prime New York strip steak and salad at The Palm steakhouse, Houston. Image 5 of 6 The Louis Gigi Delmaestro Salad consists of shrimp, green beans, tomato, onion, bacon, iceberg lettuce, roasted pepper, egg and avocado. It's served at the Palm Steakhouse.
Photo: Palm Restaurant The Louis Gigi Delmaestro Salad consists of shrimp, green beans,... Image 6 of 6 Nova Scotia Lobster BLT Sandwich at The Palm steakhouse, Houston.
Photo: Palm Restaurant Nova Scotia Lobster BLT Sandwich at The Palm steakhouse, Houston. The Palm Houston revives the power lunch 1 / 6 Back to Gallery The power lunch is not dead. It still lives in clubby places like the Palm Houston Restaurant , 6100 Westheimer, which recently began a new three-course "power lunch" menu that includes a starter, entrée (with individual side) and dessert for $25.90.
The Palm's lunch includes a choice of starter (mixed green salad, Caesar salad, soup of the day), choice of entrée (chicken parmigiana, Atlantic salmon fillet, fish special of the day, filet mignon medallions), choice of single portion side (half fries/half fried onions, vegetable of the day, linguine marinara), and choice of dessert (New York style cheesecake, flourless chocolate cake).
Of course if you want to turn your day into a three-martini lunch, that's available too. But you're on your own.
